channel.title: Another upload site besides Photobucket
channel.description:
Ok you can use tinypic and all that but there is a website that i found that my mate showed me. It's simple and easy to use.
Go to [url=http://filesmelt.com/]http://filesmelt.com/[/url] and click on simple
Once you are on Simple click the inside the white box. That allows you to upload the pictures or files you want. Once you have done that click on upload and the links will be there. They are Direct links so you can just C&P to your topics.
Again You could use Tinypic for pictures and videos but I prefer filesmelt because you can upload videos files server files pictures anything really. I don't think that there is a upload limit either which is good.
I hope this has helped you with uploading files videos etc.
[size=21pt]Note: If this is in the wrong section then please can a moderator move it to the correct section[/size]
Thanks for reading and see you guys soon
RS2BullDog

item.title: Another upload site besides Photobucket
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“RS2BullDog, post:19, topic:421657”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=524315.msg3816666#msg3816666 date=1321399924]
I changed to title to stop further confusion.
[/quote]

Ok thankyou for changing the title for me lol

[quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=524315.msg3816236#msg3816236 date=1321376628]

I liked imageshack as well but you need to be a member for it now and photobucket you need to get premium for where ever you want to see. It’s a piss take i know but still…

I’m not going to read your entire post, because a post of that size is not required for such straight forward question asked in your title.

Asides from Photobucket, I use ImageShack. There you go.

Also, wrong section, sure the mods can move it, but you should do it yourself and not let people hold your hand all the fucking time.

Please don’t try to troll on me please. I am trying to help people where else to go besides photobucket or imageshack or tinypic, not for dicks like you trying to troll on people.

Also it’s a moderators job to move topics if it’s in the wrong section. That’s their job, not ours. (That is not to offend any moderators on the forums. I know you hacve a busty job and we need to do thingsd our selves you it’s also your job to make sure that all posts are in the correct section)

[/quote]The younger generations really don’t know what trolling means these days. Get your facts straight before calling me a troll.

Also the younger generation don’t know people’s IRL age either so yeah. Im talking on this forum in college as i reply to this message[/quote]That’s where I feel sorry for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Another upload site besides Photobucket
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

For me ImageShack is the best. No captcha, multiple upload is available. If you are using their tool and upping multiple photos at the end you get a whole list with direct links which makes it really easy to post a pack on forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Another upload site besides Photobucket
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

imgur > *

And I love imageshack, but lots of people complain they are slow (not for me though).

Both imgur and imageshack have tools to download, so that you can right click your files and upload them. So you don’t need to visit the site and browse for the pictures etc.

Read full topic
